::Skulletron::

      Skulletron laughs evilishly.

      "Hahaha, you and your stupid defenses!!!" Suddenly, he runs like mad
to get away from the shots, "Shit!!!  I totally blew my cover!!!!!  And now
I'm about to be fried!!!" He yelled.

      He rolled over to the side, and fired a well aimed shot from his ray
gun, pointed near Chordate's spark, barely escaping all the shots.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, September 22, 2000 5:46 PM
Subject: Re: Ha...ha....HAHAHAHA!


>
> ::Chordate::
>
> Seeing a bot's reflection in the computer screens he had been staring
> at, Chordate ducks at the sudden movement, a gun passing over his
> head. He swears, jumping out of his chair.
>
> "Lock down!" he says into his comm as he pulls out a pistol,
> "Defences activate."
>
> Plates emerge to cover all the computers, autoguns dropping from the
> cealing to open fire on Skulletron. Chordate adds a few shots
> himself, furious that someone had tried to attack him in the Maximal
> base.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> > ::Skulletron::
> >
> >          Skulletron just realized he could've been caught spying.
> He forgot Perndabot, and walked off.  Hopefully, HotRod was
> reprogrammed now, after being repaired by Feline.  Yes, Skulletron
> just had to setup everybody in the right position, and then, victory
> would be achieved.  He would have Feline use HotRod to cause some
> chaos, and then, Skulletron would throw away Feline from his
> cabinet.  He would return to Zardus, and tell him the bad news of
> Feline not surviving.  Then, Skulletron just had to pick off of
> Zardus' other followers, slowly, and then, Skulletron and Zardus
> would be the most powerful duo.  Skulletron and Zardus.
> Yesssss..Skulletron was heading to where Chordate was.
> >
> >      He arrived.  He slowly, ever so silently, crept up behind
> Chordate, and then quickly grabbed his ray gun and swung it at
> Chordate's head, trying to knock him out.
>
>
>
>
